message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110.
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $92.
I understand you're willing to go up to $92, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you at that price. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer it to you for $105.
I'm still very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you at $98. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer it to you for $107.50.
